info.url: This is a wonderful epic series clip. The background of it is in middle age. In a training ground, some people are practicing martial arts. One man defeats the others, but then a heavier-set individual appears and is ordered to train with the others. However, the heavier man backs down after a couple of attempts. He receives encouragement and tries again but fails, displaying deep frustration and apologizing to the people around him.Meanwhile, in a rainforest, a group of horsemen is traveling. A man and a woman are sitting on a horse, engaged in conversation. They appear to have a hierarchical relationship, with the man respectfully narrating something to the woman. She asks questions, and the man provides answers. In another scene, a man is taking a bath while a woman is attending to him.
